articles.author: Ronny Reyes
articles.title: US Rep says he has proof that Biden lied Kabul airport evacuation - Daily Mail
articles.description: U.S. Rep. Markwayne Mullin, 44, said he has secret recordings of Americans failing to get to the airport in time for the final evacuation. He blamed Biden for the failings of the evacuation.
articles.content: A U.S. Representative from Oklahoma who made two unauthorized trips to try and enter Afghanistan to aid in the evacuation effort said he has proof that President Joe Biden lied about Americans and vi… [+4839 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: 'Players will explode' - Busquets warns against burnout amid proposal to hold World Cup every two years - Goal India
articles.description: Lionel Messi's Argentina and Neymar's Brazil are leading South American qualifying for the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar. The top four qualify directly and the fifth-place team will qualify for a playoff.
